name: .BLORB File Extension
summary: Learn about .BLORB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Package used by Interactive Fiction (IF) interpreters such as Zoom and Spatterlight; contains the story game and other files that enhance gameplay, such as .JPG files for cover art, .AIFF files for sound effects, and .MOD files for music.

content: BLORB files containing Z-code games often appear with .ZBLORB or ZLB extensions. Glulx games will most likely appear with the .GBLORB or .GLB extensions.
NOTE: Most Glulx games are contained in BLORB files, whereas a small amount of Z-machine games use the format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
